name: doomscrolling
description:
doomscrolling is a very short twitter-scrolling simulator about being stuck in the cycle of reading endless terrible news, feeling bad, trying to get away, and reopening it all again minutes later just to stay in the loop.
created for ludum dare 47 - "stuck in a loop"

controls:
ooh, boy, they're janky. click on the up/down buttons or use the mouse wheel to scroll

game by:
voidfishing - liv jeremiah
